tool_description: Newspaper is an API for Instapaper style article extracting and based off the python library newspaper, https://github.com/codelucas/newspaper.
name: Newspaper
title: Newspaper

api_list.name: Article

optional_parameters.name: max_text
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of character tokens in an article.

optional_parameters.name: max_title
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of characters in an article title.

optional_parameters.name: min_sent_count
optional_parameters.description: Minimum number of sentence tokens in an article.

optional_parameters.name: min_word_count
optional_parameters.description: Minumum number of word tokens in text in an article.

optional_parameters.name: max_summary
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of characters in a summary.

api_list.name: Newspaper
